results.title: You really had to be there!
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Dean Turner and ACMI
results.brief_description: Dean Turner cherishes the Punk Rock nights at the Arthouse in North Melbourne, where you could drink, hang out and have your five minutes of fame. Poverty is their way of life, but music uplifts them.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Dean Turner and ACMI
results.description: Dean Turner cherishes the Punk Rock nights at the Arthouse in North Melbourne, where you could drink, hang out and have your five minutes of fame. Poverty is their way of life, but music uplifts them.

results.title: Raptor
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Cynthia Potter and ACMI
results.brief_description: Cynthia Potter tells of her life in one of Melbourne’s Housing Commission flats and her beloved son Elvis. Energetic, with a passion for insects, Elvis makes the most of life, while Potter does the best she can with what she’s got.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Cynthia Potter and ACMI
results.description: Cynthia Potter tells of her life in one of Melbourne’s Housing Commission flats and her beloved son Elvis. Energetic, with a passion for insects, Elvis makes the most of life, while Potter does the best she can with what she’s got.
description_for_label: Cynthia Potter tells of her life in one of Melbourne’s Housing Commission flats and her beloved son Elvis. Energetic, with a passion for insects, Elvis makes the most of life, while Potter does the best she can with what she’s got.

results.title: Nothing impossible
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Aden Daud and ACMI
results.brief_description: When his country was thrown into civil war, Aden Daud’s friends would tell him to just waiting for his time to die. Instead, Daud decided to do something about it and seek out a more secure life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Aden Daud and ACMI

results.title: My family
results.brief_description: Salma gives a first-hand account of being a refugee. Fleeing the conflict in Sudan, she talks about the pain and anxiety of her journey to Australia, as well as the gratitude she feels for her new country.
results.description: Salma gives a first-hand account of being a refugee. Fleeing the conflict in Sudan, she talks about the pain and anxiety of her journey to Australia, as well as the gratitude she feels for her new country.

results.title: 'Remembrance of things past'...a watercolour memoir for Richard
results.brief_description: When Judith recalls Richard’s legacy, she sees it through his watercolour paintings that stand as a aesthetic record to his life, from his childhood to his adult academic pursuits.

results.title: Breathe
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Yan Wawrzynczak and ACMI
results.brief_description: Yan Wawrzynczak weaves a moving story about a man, the woman he fell in love with and their child. Over several continents and many years, Wawrzynczak covers the changing seasons of this relationship as the three move in and out of each other’s lives.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Yan Wawrzynczak and ACMI
results.description: Yan Wawrzynczak weaves a moving story about a man, the woman he fell in love with and their child. Over several continents and many years, Wawrzynczak covers the changing seasons of this relationship as the three move in and out of each other’s lives.
description_for_label: Yan Wawrzynczak weaves a moving story about a man, the woman he fell in love with and their child. Over several continents and many years, Wawrzynczak covers the changing seasons of this relationship as the three move in and out of each other’s lives.
